entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
